name: Astromantica
description:
Astromantica is a hybrid visual novel space opera game about war, connections and making amends. You play as either enemy sides in a war and your goal is to end the war and reconcile with your former ally and friend.

This updated version is a demo made during Stugan. The original prototype with which I applied to Stugan was developed in the course of a month during NaNoReNo 2016. Not all core mechanics have been implemented yet, so this is still a bit far behind of what the actual game will be.

Right now the game is temporarily on hold as I can't afford to keep developing it for the time being. Please consider supporting me on Patreon if you'd like to see more of it! I would love to hear any feedback you might have for the game :)

Credits:

- additional dialogue: Eileen Holowka (@elmahka)

- main song: Michael Kelly (@garoadmusic)
